snippet.title: Star Road Retooled Release Trailer!
snippet.description:
BPS download below (It's inside the zip file) (help: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dDNMz2SyGtY)
LINK HERE: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1b9j8Gzb00ts4CZxH6znLqS7DpVd4f53g/view?usp=share_link
Stardisplay layout here: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1vqCIOrPqfLWY-diPW6iBv38sUMZlnz5w/view?usp=share_link
Current version: Old engine 1.1.1
readme:
USE THIS https://sites.google.com/view/shurislibrary/project64-301n
OR https://drive.google.com/file/d/1Z4MnIXuus2CaFa10qH0u_ZPMYbDPL0_x/view?usp=sharing 
EMULATOR DOWNLOAD LINK FOR BEST WINDOWS PERFORMANCE

For other emulators, setting memory size to 8MB is needed
DO NOT use Jabo's Graphics plugin, and preferably not any LLE plugin, like ParaLLEl, angrylion
There is another zip file embedded into the download which will work on very accurate emulators (like Ares or Simple64) and technically console, but is highly unrecommended.

This is the version of the game using the original SM64's engine, i.e. it wasn't recompiled with sm64decomp, a version of that will be coming after this version releases, but if you see a newer version labelled "Recommended", use that version instead.
1.1 fixes many miscellaneous issues, adds widescreen and FOV changing support, and fixes music issues

Known bugs with no known fixes:
Invisible walls exist rarely
Some key door animations are backwards
Star camera is too zoomed in sometimes
Going into a cannon with the cap timer causes it to display weird numbers
c7 and c8 area 2 MIGHT crash rarely?
